HomePage.heading: Welcome to Greenstand Wallet App!
HomePage.title: Greenstand Wallet App
HomePage.body: Greenstand Wallet App helps you connect your shop to the global Greenstand wallet system. It extends your checkout page to be able to sell clients tree-based impacts as Greenstand Impact Tokens. Each token is linked directly to the growth of a tree.

NotFound.description: Check the URL and try again, or use the search bar to find what you need.
NotFound.heading: There is no page at this address

Wallet.title: Wallet
Wallet.body: Each token is linked to the growth of a tree. By selling these, you are directly supporting people growing trees - this benefits both you and the client.
Wallet.heading: Buy tokens to sell to your clients
Wallet.modalHeading: Are you sure you want to buy {{tokenQuantity}} tokens?

CreateWallet.title: Wallet / Create Wallet
CreateWallet.Section1Desc: Greenstand needs this information to contact your store
CreateWallet.Section2Desc: Greenstand needs this information to save your wallet
CreateWallet.TermsAndConditions: I agree to the terms and conditions
